## Installation

First install required packages

install.packages("tidyverse","sf","lwgeom","devtools")

devtools::install_github("carlosyanez/aussiemaps")


```{r}

melb_inner1 <- tibble(LGA=c("Mebourne","Port Phillip","Stonnington"),State=rep("VIC",3)) %>% 
                     load_map(aggregation = "LGA")

melb_inner2 <- tibble(LGA=c("Mebourne","Port Phillip","Stonnington"),State=rep("VIC",3)) %>% 
                     load_map(aggregation = "LOCALITY")

ggplot() + geom_sf(data=melb_inner2,aes(fill=LOCALITY,colour=LOCALITY)) +
           geom_sf(data=melb_inner2,colour="red",fill="white",alpha=0)

```
